ContactListAppPage.description: This page is the login page for the Contact List App. It allows existing users to log in with their email and password, and provides a link for new users to sign up.

elements.name: Email Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's email address.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's password.

elements.name: Submit Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Sign Up Link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the sign-up page for new users.

AddUserPage.description: This page allows a user to create a new account by providing their first name, last name, email, and password.

elements.name: First Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's first name.

elements.name: Last Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's last name.

elements.name: Email Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's email address.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's password.

elements.name: Submit Button
elements.description: Button to submit the new user form.

elements.name: Cancel Button
elements.description: Button to cancel the new user creation and navigate back.

assertions: The 'Sign up to begin adding your contacts!' text is present
